name: df-eqp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(ceqp, cmpt(s0, cprime, copab(s1, s2, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), co(cz, cmap, cz)), wral(s3, cz, wcel(csu(s4, cfv(cuz, cneg(cv(s3))), co(co(cfv(cv(s1), cneg(cv(s4))), cmin, cfv(cv(s2), cneg(cv(s4)))), cdiv, co(cv(s0), cexp, co(cv(s4), caddc, co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1))))), cz))))))
comment: Define an equivalence relation on ` ZZ ` -indexed sequences of integers such that two sequences are equivalent iff the difference is equivalent to zero, and a sequence is equivalent to zero iff the sum ` sum_ k <_ n f ( k ) ( p ^ k ) ` is a multiple of ` p ^ ( n + 1 ) ` for every ` n ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
